item.title: Dynamic Routing Protocols: BGP
item.description: Let’s dive into something that’s at the core of how the internet works: BGP, or Border Gateway Protocol. If youâ€™ve ever wondered how data finds its way across the globe, BGP is a big part of that magic. Think of BGP as the postal service of the internet. Just like how postal services route your mail through various cities to get it to its destination, BGP routes data between different networks.
